formattedAddress: 317 E 34th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 317 E 34th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: Dr Shelton has changed my life. There simply are no words to describe him. I had a dark port wine birthmark under my lip. Over the course of 10 months he has lighten it to be barely visible. The results of his laser treatment are outstanding. That he is a professional genius is a given but the icing on the cake is that he is such a nice guy. He is so happy when he can deliver the desired result. I am the luckiest girl in the world and so very grateful to be his patient. His office staff is also accommodating, so nice and work hard to make sure you get the appointments you need. His nurses and medical staff are top drawer. The total package is outstanding. It is such a positive experience from the time you check in until you depart post treatment. I drive into the city from NJ but even if I lived out of the tri state area, I would find a way to be treated by him. It goes without saying that I highly recommend Dr. Shelton.

originalText.text:
You can imagine how scary a Moh's surgery on my nose right next to my eye was for me.
Dr. Shelton's calm, kind and reassuring demeanor put me right at ease and the results were excellent!!!
There was no pain involved at any point and not even the teeniest of scars. He is an expert practitioner with an eye for perfection.
Dr. Shelton is the best of the best.

originalText.text: I can’t say enough about Dr. Shelton. In the three years that I have been seeing him, he consistently rejuvenates my face in every visit. He guides my treatment plan with honesty, an eye to efficacy, tangible results, and cost effectiveness. Whether it’s lasers, ultrasound, fillers, or Botox, I trust him completely. He is the best practitioner I have found, and I highly recommend him.

text.text: I can’t say enough about Dr. Shelton. In the three years that I have been seeing him, he consistently rejuvenates my face in every visit. He guides my treatment plan with honesty, an eye to efficacy, tangible results, and cost effectiveness. Whether it’s lasers, ultrasound, fillers, or Botox, I trust him completely. He is the best practitioner I have found, and I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Dr. Shelton is kind, patient, answers questions willingly, and explains everything he is doing. Most important, he is an excellent MOHS surgeon. The office is run efficiently and seems well-organized; the staff is excellent: lovely, experienced, knowledgeable, and clearly has the patients' best interests in mind.  I recommend Dr. Shelton and the office without hesitation.

text.text: Dr. Shelton is kind, patient, answers questions willingly, and explains everything he is doing. Most important, he is an excellent MOHS surgeon. The office is run efficiently and seems well-organized; the staff is excellent: lovely, experienced, knowledgeable, and clearly has the patients' best interests in mind.  I recommend Dr. Shelton and the office without hesitation.

originalText.text: I accompanied my husband for a Mohs surgical procedure.  The staff was welcoming and made us feel comfortable from the start.  Dr. Shelton was friendly and interactive with us, making us feel confident that he would do a good job.  He explained the procedure and answered our questions in a calm and relaxed manner.  The nurses who worked with him were professional as well as friendly and reassuring.  I highly recommend Dr. Shelton.
